name: Shabda
0:
”Alexa, ask shabda roopa for rama”
”Alexa, open shabda roopa for all shabda”
”Alexa, open shabda roopa for guru shabda”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shabda roopa
Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn and Memorize Sanskrit noun declensions (Shabdas) instantly. Provides more than 30+ Shabdas recited by a human reciter in a soothing rhythmic tune. The shabdas have been selected such that one can memorize other variations by learning this core set. The following Shabdas are contained in this skill: rAma, hari, guru, dhAtRRi, ramA, go, glo, mati, nadhi, dhenu, vadhu, mAtRRi, vana, vAri, madhu, sakhi, ambA, lakShmI, jalamuch, rAjan, Atman, chandramas, gir, dish, asmad, tad, yad, etad, idam, adasha, kim, sarva, eka, yuShmad
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
